A smile made its way to Belthassan's face.

Belthassan:
See, Melchana? They want to join us. Maybe you could even train them to 
fight!

Melchana:
Maybe... But as soon as they prove themselves incompetent, I shall take care 
of them personnally!

Belthassan:
Commander Tankor, we welcome the chance to have new members in the 
Tripredacus force on Earth. Please meet me in front of our base. We shall 
discuss further about your adhesion to us.
